images.caption: Prayer Carpet, early 18th century. Warp: undyed white wool, z2S, 1 level Weft: red wool, z1S, 2 shoots Pile: wool, z2S , Dims: 65 1/2 x 47 1/4 in. (166.4 x 120 cm). Brooklyn Museum, Gift of Horace O. Havemeyer, 32.2087. Creative Commons-BY (Photo: Brooklyn Museum, 32.2087_bw.jpg)
